archimate:Requirement.name: PA.2.2.3f: f) deletion (often referred to as 'remote wipe') to securely destroy all information stored on the device and any attached storage (e.g. flash memory cards such as secure digital (SD) and compact flash).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
